oracleReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
     LOGICAL_TABLE_NUMBER dd
    ,LOGICAL_TABLE_NAME   ee
    ,KEY_ITEM_01          ff
    ,KEY_ITEM_02          gg
    ,KEY_ITEM_03          hh
    ,FIXED_ITEM_01        ii
FROM 
    ZHR_CM_FIXED_VALUE_TB FIXED 
WHERE 
  LOGICAL_TABLE_NUMBER = '802'
  AND KEY_ITEM_03 = '給与'
  AND KEY_ITEM_01 = '@{item()['PAYROLL_NAME']}'
AND SYSDATE BETWEEN EFFECTIVE_START_DATE AND EFFECTIVE_END_DATE
ORDER BY LOGICAL_TABLE_NUMBER,KEY_ITEM_01,KEY_ITEM_02;

properties.description: Move files from one folder to another folder

activities.name: ForEachFile
activities.description: Iterate each file, and move them one by one.

activities.name: CopyAFile
activities.description: Copy a file from the source store to the destination store.

activities.name: DeleteAFile
activities.description: Delete a file from the source store

activities.name: FilterFiles
activities.description: Only files will be selected, the source-folders will not be selected.

oracleReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
     LOGICAL_TABLE_NUMBER dd
    ,LOGICAL_TABLE_NAME   ee
    ,KEY_ITEM_01          ff
    ,KEY_ITEM_02          gg
    ,KEY_ITEM_03          hh
    ,FIXED_ITEM_01        ii
FROM 
    ZHR_CM_FIXED_VALUE_TB FIXED 
WHERE 
  LOGICAL_TABLE_NUMBER = '802'
  AND KEY_ITEM_03 = '給与'
  AND KEY_ITEM_01 = '@{variables('payrollN')}'
AND SYSDATE BETWEEN EFFECTIVE_START_DATE AND EFFECTIVE_END_DATE
ORDER BY LOGICAL_TABLE_NUMBER,KEY_ITEM_01,KEY_ITEM_02;

SELECT   PPF.PAYROLL_NAME       aa
        ,PTPV.PERIOD_NAME       bb
        ,REGULAR_PAYMENT_DATE   cc
FROM    PER_TIME_PERIODS_V PTPV
       ,PAY_PAYROLLS_F     PPF
WHERE   PTPV.PAYROLL_ID = PPF.PAYROLL_ID
AND     PTPV.PERIOD_NAME = '@{pipeline().parameters.カレンダ月}'
ORDER BY  PTPV.PAYROLL_ID;

SELECT 
     LOGICAL_TABLE_NUMBER dd
    ,LOGICAL_TABLE_NAME   ee
    ,KEY_ITEM_01          ff
    ,KEY_ITEM_02          gg
    ,KEY_ITEM_03          hh
    ,FIXED_ITEM_01        ii
FROM 
    ZHR_CM_FIXED_VALUE_TB FIXED 
WHERE 
  LOGICAL_TABLE_NUMBER = '802'
  AND KEY_ITEM_03 = '給与'
AND SYSDATE BETWEEN EFFECTIVE_START_DATE AND EFFECTIVE_END_DATE
ORDER BY LOGICAL_TABLE_NUMBER,KEY_ITEM_01,KEY_ITEM_02;

SELECT 
     LOGICAL_TABLE_NUMBER dd
    ,LOGICAL_TABLE_NAME   ee
    ,KEY_ITEM_01          ff
    ,KEY_ITEM_02          gg
    ,KEY_ITEM_03          hh
    ,FIXED_ITEM_01        ii
FROM 
    ZHR_CM_FIXED_VALUE_TB FIXED 
WHERE 
  LOGICAL_TABLE_NUMBER = '802'
  AND KEY_ITEM_03 = '給与'
  AND KEY_ITEM_01 = '@{variables('payrollname')[0]}'
AND SYSDATE BETWEEN EFFECTIVE_START_DATE AND EFFECTIVE_END_DATE
ORDER BY LOGICAL_TABLE_NUMBER,KEY_ITEM_01,KEY_ITEM_02;
